We offer a calm and familiar environment for each consultation. With our extensive experience and dedication, we are committed to caring for the health of your beloved feline.

SLIDER.ARIA_LABEL: Carousel of testimonials from our clients

ITEMS.QUOTE: My cat received exceptional services, ensuring his comfort and peace of mind at all times. The veterinarians were patient, skilled, and achieved fantastic results. I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for a caring and talented veterinary team.

The caregivers were attentive, affectionate, and provided regular updates on my cats' activities. It was clear that they treated my cats with the same love as if they were part of their own family. I wouldn't hesitate to trust them again to take care of my little ones!

The team truly goes above and beyond for their patients. From the moment I saw them work, I could feel the warmth and genuine love they have for animals. I felt reassured and confident in their expertise. My pet received top-notch medical care, and I am grateful for their compassion and dedication.

SLIDER.ARIA_LABEL: Carousel of our specialized veterinarian team

MEMBERS.NAME: Dr. Paula Morales
MEMBERS.ABOUT:
Hello! I'm Paula Morales Rodríguez, cats, with their elegance, independence and mystery, have always fascinated me. More than pets, they are for me life companions, masters of wisdom and guardians of ancestral secrets.

That deep connection with the feline world prompted me to become a Veterinarian, a decision that not only fills me with professional satisfaction, but also allows me to merge my passion for art with my vocation of service.

Since I was a child, my heart has beaten to the rhythm of a purr.

Beyond the white coats and medical instruments, I am a feline medical artist. I use my creativity and sensitivity to understand each cat as a unique individual, giving them the personalized attention they need to flourish.

When I am not taking care of my feline patients, I take refuge in the world of colors and shapes. Painting is my escape, my way of expressing the emotions that flood me when interacting with these wonderful beings. I also enjoy the company of my family and friends, those fundamental pillars that fill me with energy and remind me of the importance of emotional ties.

And when the adventurous spirit calls me, I embark on trips that allow me to discover new cultures, landscapes and flavors. Each experience enriches me as a person and gives me new perspectives for my work as a veterinarian.
MEMBERS.EXPERIENCE:
I am a licensed Veterinarian from Universidad de la Salle in Bogotá, Colombia. My extensive experience in the management and care of felines allows me to diagnose, treat and ensure the health of your little one. I am always committed to the welfare of cats and I am passionate about giving them the attention they deserve.

The organism and functioning of cats is somewhat complex, so I always seek to train myself to treat any eventuality. In addition to my practical experience, I have done complementary studies, such as the Curso Internacional Medicina Felina al Extremo, which has allowed me to deepen in the specific feeding and behavior of cats for the impact on their welfare.

I have also attended many veterinary conferences at national congresses on topics such as feline ethology, preventive medicine, and the latest trends in treatment. My commitment is to stay current with best practices and provide the most up-to-date care for your kitty.

If you have any questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to contact us. We're here to care for your furry friends and ensure they have a full and active life. 🐾

MEMBERS.NAME: Dr. Vanessa Bonilla
MEMBERS.ABOUT:
Hello! I am Vanessa Bonilla Sánchez, and ever since I was young, I have always wanted to study Veterinary Medicine. Allow me to share a little more about myself:

Cats are my weakness. Their elegance, independence, and mystery fascinate me. Throughout my career, I have worked with felines of all ages and personalities.

Every purr always teaches me something new.

Since I was young, I have always felt a special connection with nature. I love to go out and explore towns, walk through trails surrounded by trees, and discover hidden corners. Each place has its own story and beauty, and it fills me with joy to immerse myself in the local culture and learn from the people and places I visit.
MEMBERS.EXPERIENCE:
As a Veterinary Zootecnist, I have dedicated years to caring for and protecting small animals. My love for them led me to specialize in Internal Medicine, where I have explored the relationship between humans, animals, and their environment.

In addition to my practical experience with them, I always seek to learn whenever I can and have the opportunity. I have completed complementary studies such as the international diploma in Feline Internal Medicine by the Antonio Nariño University of Bogotá, and many others similar, to always be at the forefront of advances in feline medicine and the well-being of these whiskered companions. I am certified as a Cat Friendly Veterinary Professional by the AAFP.

As a professional in veterinary zootecnist medicine, my focus will be on providing high-quality care to our feline patients. My goal will always be to understand the individual needs of each cat and provide personalized solutions to keep them healthy and happy. My experience and love for felines drive me to continually learn and improve.

If you have any questions or need assistance, do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to care for your furry friends and ensure they have a full and active life. 🐾

FAQ.TITLE: Frequently asked questions
FAQ.IMAGE_ALT: Image for the Frequently asked questions section

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: How do I request an appointment for a home veterinary service?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: You can request an appointment through our whatsapp button directly or through our contact form on the website. We will be happy to schedule a visit at a time that suits you.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: What should I prepare before the veterinarian's visit?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: We recommend keeping your cat in a quiet, safe space, preferably in the living room or wherever he feels comfortable. Also be sure to keep his medical history handy, including records of vaccinations and any medications he is taking.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: How will my cat behave during the visit?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Most cats are more comfortable in their everyday environment, which can make the visit less stressful. However, every cat is different, so we will be prepared to handle any situation. We will send you a guide before the visit with all the instructions.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: What payment methods are available to pay for the service?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: We accept different methods of payment, such as cash and bank transfer. Payment is made at the end of the visit. Write us via WhatsApp for more details.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: Do you attend veterinary emergencies?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: Our home veterinary service is not designed for emergencies. If your cat has an emergency, we recommend that you go to the nearest 24-hour veterinary clinic. If you need help finding a clinic, we can provide you with contact information for local clinics.

QUESTIONS.QUESTION: What if I need to cancel or reschedule my appointment?
QUESTIONS.ANSWER: We understand that unforeseen circumstances may arise, but we ask that you give us at least 24 hours notice if you need to cancel or reschedule your appointment. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice may be subject to charges.
